resources.string: Error on contacting the Pig. The error is recorded and we will solve it as soon as possible.
Error on contacting the Pig. It\'s either a internet problem or a system issue. If it\'s the second option, the error is recorded and we will solve it as soon as possible.
Not identified site error. Contact us.
There is a problem with the connection to the site
There was a problem with the connection, but your move can be send when the problem is solved
We tried to create your move when internet came back, but it had an error
Error on calling api, object null
Please describe the suggestion, doubt or problem at the system
